name: patientRegistration
description: This is for demonstration purposes only and MUST not be used operationally.
comment: Patient Registration options example of a custom operation

parameter.name: for
parameter.documentation: The NHS Number of the patient being registered.

parameter.name: owner
parameter.documentation: The ODS code of the GP Surgery being asked to register the patient

parameter.name: status
parameter.documentation: `requested` for the initial request. Status from ValueSet http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-task-status.html

parameter.name: authoredOn
parameter.documentation: date time the request was authored

parameter.name: requester
parameter.documentation: The professional and ODS code of the requester (ODS code may be sufficient)

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: The updated Patient resource to be used to register the Patient. GP Suppliers MUST update PDS with these details
